# Ex04 Places Around Me
## Date: 21-11-2025

## AIM
To develop a website to display details about the places around my house.

## DESIGN STEPS

### STEP 1
Create a Django admin interface.

### STEP 2
Download your city map from Google.

### STEP 3
Using ```<map>``` tag name the map.

### STEP 4
Create clickable regions in the image using ```<area>``` tag.

### STEP 5
Write HTML programs for all the regions identified.

### STEP 6
Execute the programs and publish them.

## CODE
```
<!-- Image Map Generated by http://www.image-map.net/ -->
<img src="Screenshot 2025-11-21 194604.png" usemap="#image-map">

<map name="image-map">
    <area target="" alt="AJB mahal" title="AJB mahal" href="AJB mahal.html" coords="573,212,722,291" shape="rect">
    <area target="" alt="CKC cinemas" title="CKC cinemas" href="CKC cinemas.html" coords="547,456,783,495" shape="rect">
    <area target="" alt="sundarlodge" title="sundarlodge" href="sundarlodge.html" coords="389,230,71" shape="circle">
    <!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>AJB mahal</title>
</head>
<body>
    <h2>AJB mahal</h2>
    <p>The term "AJB Mahal" primarily refers to a banquet hall and event venue in Tirupattur, Vellore, 
        in the state of Tamil Nadu, India, rather than a historical monument like the Taj Mahal.
        AJB Mahal functions as a popular venue for various events, including weddings, birthday parties,
         and corporate gatherings.It is situated in the Tirupattur Fort area, specifically located near Kottai Sivan Kovil.
         The venue is designed to accommodate a large number of guests,
          with a seating capacity of 750 and a floating capacity of 1,125 people. Its dining hall can seat 250 guests.
    </p>
    
</body>
</html>
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>CKC cinemas</title>
</head>
<body>
    <h2>CKC cinemas</h2>
    <p>CKC Cinemas is a movie theater located in Tirupathur, Tamil Nadu, at No 23 A, CKC Nagar.
         It is an air-conditioned, 3D, RGB Laser, and Dolby Atmos cinema with amenities like sofas and Dolby
          7.1 surround sound. The cinema shows a variety of movies, including recent Tamil releases,
           with services such as online bookings available.No 23 A, CKC Nagar, Tirupathur, Tamil Nadu, 635602.
            It is located near the CKC Marriage Hall.The theater offers various amenities for a comfortable movie-watching experience.
             Showtimes and movie information can be found online.
             Bookings are often available online.
    </p>
</body>
</html> 
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>sundar lodge</title>
</head>
<body>
    <h2>sundar lodge</h2>
    <p>Sundar Lodge is a highly-rated, budget-friendly accommodation located in Tiruppattur
        Tamil Nadu, known for its clean rooms, friendly staff, and convenient location near public transport links.
        The lodge offers a variety of room types, including Standard Rooms, Fan Rooms,
         and Prestige Family Rooms, many of which are air-conditioned and have been recently renovated.
          Rooms feature private bathrooms, flat-screen TVs with cable channels, and work desks.
           Guests can benefit from a 24-hour front desk, efficient room service, and daily housekeeping.
        The lodge provides complimentary Wi-Fi in all rooms and public areas, and free on-site car parking.
    </p>
    
</body>
</html>
```
